  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a REACT

name: ReactionDetectedIssueCode
title: ReactionDetectedIssueCode
description: Proposed therapy may be inappropriate or contraindicated based on the potential for a patient reaction to the proposed product
